name: The Cats Bahamas
description:
Welcome to the cat's Bahamas, this place is full of boats, islands, cats, timers, jellyfish, money, shops and  more! ( rocks )

You play as a cat, who's only goal is to collect money and buy expensive items, but watch out, bad things can happen if you try to buy them. Make sure to be quick, because once that timer ticks down to zero the jellyfish appear, and after that, there's no going back.

Experience all of the following:  

  • over 10 seconds of exciting island and boat gameplay. 
  • over 2 different items to buy
  • at least 5 levels
  • RNG mechanics that keep the game fresh and exhilarating.
  • 11 whole dollars
  • A brain twisting puzzle whenever you die
  • And so much more! ( rocks )

Made for Sylvie's Jam #1 in 3 days.  Follows the entire theme. Arguably not a game you hate, however I put enough elements in it that annoyed me so that I could say I at least hate parts of the game.
